definition[0]: relating to money, taxes, debts etc that are owned and managed by the government
example[1]: Sound  (=good)  fiscal policies are required to combat inflation.
definition[1]: connected with government taxes, debts, and spending
example[3]: The fiscal deficit was estimated at $53,800,000 or 3.5% of gross national product.
example[4]: The current fiscal crisis is the result of overborrowing by the previous administration.
